overview: It's time for Robert and his team to make their mark on the music scene. Or maybe it's 40 years too late. In Nashville you play for free so you might get found. This surreal musical comedy follows Robert, his manager (ex girlfriend), roommate/drummer, and driver (bass player) as they work through the highs and lows of a life in music.
tagline: They're not in it for the money.
title: Play For Free
